## VerticalAutocompleteRequest interface

Options for a vertial autocomplete request.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface VerticalAutocompleteRequest extends SearchRequest 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [SearchRequest](./search-core.searchrequest.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [input](./search-core.verticalautocompleterequest.input.md) | string | The input string for autocomplete. |
|  [sessionTrackingEnabled?](./search-core.verticalautocompleterequest.sessiontrackingenabled.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Enables session tracking. |
|  [verticalKey](./search-core.verticalautocompleterequest.verticalkey.md) | string | The key for the vertical to get autocomplete suggestions from. |
